SELECT rnum, ti_num, RESULT.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, COUNT(seat_num) AS seat_num, u_id, ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th_name, hall_date, hall_turn, hall_time, s_price, pay_name, pay_amount, B.is_likes, pay_num FROM ( SELECT rnum, t.ti_num, s.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, ts.seat_num, t.u_id, t.ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th.th_name, hall_date, hall_turn, hall_time, s.s_price, p.pay_name, p.pay_amount, p.pay_num FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, ti_num, ti_regdate, seat_date, u_id, ti_status, pay_num FROM ticket ) t INNER JOIN ticket_seat ts ON t.ti_num = ts.ti_num INNER JOIN seat se ON ts.seat_num = se.seat_num INNER JOIN hall h ON se.hall_id = h.hall_id INNER JOIN theater th ON h.th_num = th.th_num INNER JOIN show s ON th.th_num = s.th_num INNER JOIN img i ON s.s_num = i.s_num INNER JOIN pay p ON t.pay_num = p.pay_num WHERE ts.ti_num = #{ti_num} AND t.u_id = #{u_id} AND img_dir LIKE '%'||'poster' ) RESULT LEFT JOIN (SELECT s_num, 1 is_likes FROM bookmark WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM bookmark WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND s_num = #{s_num})) B ON RESULT.s_num = B.s_num GROUP BY rnum, ti_num, RESULT.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, u_id, ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th_name, hall_date, hall_turn, hall_time, s_price, pay_name, pay_amount, B.is_likes, pay_num

mapper.select: SELECT t.u_id, t.ti_num, s.s_name, seat_date FROM ticket t JOIN ticket_seat ts ON t.ti_num = ts.ti_num JOIN seat se ON ts.seat_num = se.seat_num JOIN hall h ON se.hall_id = h.hall_id JOIN theater th ON h.th_num = th.th_num JOIN show s ON th.th_num = s.th_num WHERE u_id = #{u_id} GROUP BY t.u_id, t.ti_num, s.s_name, seat_date
